title: Committees & Working Groups
subtitle: Get involved in the ongoing work of Delaware DSA through our committees and working groups.
description: Committees handle the ongoing operational work of our chapter, while working groups focus on specific issues and campaigns. All members are welcome to join any committee or working group.

committees.title: Political Education Committee (PEC)
committees.purpose: Carries out internal political education functions for the chapter

committees.title: Communications Committee (Comms)
privileges: Social media access (subject to SC approval)
Basic support coordination with other committees

committees.title: Membership Engagement Committee (MEC)
committees.purpose: Handles recruitment, onboarding, retention of members
privileges: Access to limited membership data (names, phone numbers, general location)

committees.title: Socialists-in-Office Committee (SiO)
committees.purpose: Coordinates involvement with electoral campaigns (local, state, federal), recruits and researches candidates for elected office, produces candidate questionnaires for each electoral cycle

workingGroups.title: Arts & Culture Working Group (ACWG)
workingGroups.purpose: Explores and organizes around arts and cultural activities

workingGroups.title: International Solidarity Working Group (ISWG)
workingGroups.purpose: Focuses on international solidarity and anti-imperialism work

workingGroups.title: Migrant Rights Working Group (MRWG)
workingGroups.purpose: Organizes around migrant rights and immigrant justice

workingGroups.title: Mutual Aid Working Group (MAWG)
workingGroups.purpose: Coordinates mutual aid activities and direct service

workingGroups.title: Queer Socialists Working Group (QSWG)
workingGroups.purpose: Organizes around LGBTQ+ identity and liberation
